000
 FAUS43 KKCI 261845
 FA3W
 CHIC FA 261845
 SYNOPSIS AND VFR CLDS/WX
 SYNOPSIS VALID UNTIL 271300
 CLDS/WX VALID UNTIL 270700…OTLK VALID 270700-271300
 ND SD NE KS MN IA MO WI LM LS MI LH IL IN KY
 
 SEE AIRMET SIERRA FOR IFR CONDS AND MTN OBSCN.
 TS IMPLY SEV OR GTR TURB SEV ICE LLWS AND IFR CONDS.
 NON MSL HGTS DENOTED BY AGL OR CIG.
 
 SYNOPSIS…HIGH PRES NRN MN-SRN MO. TROF OF LOW PRES XTRM WRN
 DAKOTAS-NEB PNHDL. 13Z LOW PRES WRN NEB. CDFNT NRN ND. QUASI-STNR
 FNT NWRN SD-WRN NEB.
